performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
We felt that Shania was not yet ready to commence a teacher training qualification and her answers to our questions often lacked depth. She had some difficulty in expressing her motivation and commitment to being a teacher. In addition, she was not able to show links between the theory that she had learnt and what she had observed or undertaken in the classroom.

Our recommendations would be as follows:-

Gain more experience of speaking in public. 
Start to relate theory to practice, particularly with regards to behaviour management. 
Undertake additional training on safeguarding.
